parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.84

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Object

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Process an animation of 3D [[Arma: GUI Configuration]]. Command uses name defined by source property and works similar like [[animateSource]] command.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control '''ctrlAnimateModel''' [source, phase]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control : [[Control]] - 3D control

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [source, phase]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> source: [[String]] - common source

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> phase: [[Number]] - wanted animation phase

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control3D [[ctrlAnimateModel]] ["Close",1];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ctrlLaptop [[ctrlAnimateModel]] ["Lid",1];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlAnimationPhaseModel]], [[ctrlCreate]], [[ctrlDelete]], [[ctrlModel]], [[ctrlPosition]], [[ctrlSetPosition]], [[ctrlClassName]], [[displayCtrl]], [[ctrlModelScale]], [[ctrlSetModelScale]], [[ctrlModelDirAndUp]], [[ctrlSetModelDirAndUp]]
</value></part></template></root>
